text: Aniatachu, pasal hah dânderit ani noa, ha dôngmate hah innei7:37: innei loi rang; aninônchu a nâinupang in min neiloi rang. loi ranga mulungbôk det taka sinsiema, male a nuomlam a dier theipu han chu om rang chang a mulungrîla a mindon suo zoi, dôngmate7:37: dôngmate hah inneipui senla; aninônchu in min nei nirse. hah in a neipui loi sikin a tho min sa.
